module.name: workbench
module.descr: Function related AppIcons, AppWindows, AppMenuitems and other Workbench display structures are located in this unit.

element.name: POldDrawerData
element.short: Pointer to OldDrawer structure

element.name: TOldDrawerData
element.short: Old Structure to describe the view of the content of a drawer (pre AmigaOS V36)

element.name: TOldDrawerData.dd_NewWindow
element.short: Args to open window

element.name: TOldDrawerData.dd_CurrentX
element.short: Current x coordinate of origin

element.name: TOldDrawerData.dd_CurrentY
element.short: Current y coordinate of origin

element.name: OLDDRAWERDATAFILESIZE
element.short: The amount of OldDrawerData actually written to disk

element.name: PDrawerData
element.short: Pointer to Drawer structure

element.name: TDrawerData
element.short: New Structure to describe the view of the content of a drawer

element.name: TDrawerData.dd_NewWindow
element.short: Args to open window

element.name: TDrawerData.dd_CurrentX
element.short: Current x coordinate of origin

element.name: TDrawerData.dd_CurrentY
element.short: Current y coordinate of origin

element.name: TDrawerData.dd_Flags
element.short: Flags for drawer (DDFLAGS_*)

element.name: TDrawerData.dd_ViewModes
element.short: View mode for drawer (DDVM_*)

element.name: DRAWERDATAFILESIZE
element.short: the amount of DrawerData actually written to disk

element.name: DDVM_BYDEFAULT
element.short: View mode for .dd_ViewModes Default (inherit parent's view mode)

element.name: DDVM_BYICON
element.short: View mode for .dd_ViewModes View as icons

element.name: DDVM_BYNAME
element.short: View mode for .dd_ViewModes View as text, sorted by name

element.name: DDVM_BYDATE
element.short: View mode for .dd_ViewModes View as text, sorted by date

element.name: DDVM_BYSIZE
element.short: View mode for .dd_ViewModes View as text, sorted by size

element.name: DDVM_BYTYPE
element.short: View mode for .dd_ViewModes View as text, sorted by type

element.name: DDFLAGS_SHOWDEFAULT
element.short: Flags for .dd_Flags Default (show only icons)

element.name: DDFLAGS_SHOWICONS
element.short: Flags for .dd_Flags Show only icons

element.name: DDFLAGS_SHOWALL
element.short: Flags for .dd_Flags Show all files

element.name: TDiskObject
element.short: Representation of an *.info file

element.name: TDiskObject.do_Magic
element.short: A magic number at the start of the file

element.name: TDiskObject.do_Version
element.short: A version number, so we can change it

element.name: TDiskObject.do_Gadget
element.short: A copy of in core gadget

element.name: TDiskObject.do_Type
element.short: Type for icons (WB*)

element.name: TDiskObject.do_ToolTypes
element.short: List of ToolTypes

element.name: TDiskObject.do_CurrentX
element.short: Current X Position of Icon

element.name: TDiskObject.do_CurrentY
element.short: Current Y Position of Icon

element.name: TDiskObject.do_ToolWindow
element.short: Only applies to tools

element.name: TDiskObject.do_StackSize
element.short: Only applies to tools

element.name: WBDISK
element.short: Type of Icon: Disk

element.name: WBDRAWER
element.short: Type of Icon: Drawer/Folder

element.name: WBTOOL
element.short: Type of Icon: Tool (Excutable)

element.name: WBPROJECT
element.short: Type of Icon: Project (Data file)

element.name: WBGARBAGE
element.short: Type of Icon: Trashcan

element.name: WBDEVICE
element.short: Type of Icon: Device

element.name: WBKICK
element.short: Type of Icon: KickStart disk

element.name: WBAPPICON
element.short: Type of Icon: AppIcon

element.name: WB_DISKVERSION
element.short: Our current version number

element.name: WB_DISKREVISION
element.short: Our current revision number

element.name: WB_DISKREVISIONMASK
element.short: We only use the lower 8 bits of Gadget.UserData for the revision #

element.name: WB_DISKMAGIC
element.short: A magic number, not easily impersonated

element.name: PFreeList
element.short: Memory management in the icon.library

element.name: TFreeList
element.short: Memory management in the icon.library

element.name: NO_ICON_POSITION
element.short: Icon without a fixed position has this Value

element.name: PWBArg
element.short: Pointer to an Workbench argument

element.name: TWBArg
element.short: Workbech argument list entry

element.name: TWBArg.wa_Lock
element.short: A lock descriptor

element.name: TWBArg.wa_Name
element.short: A string relative to that lock

element.name: WBArgList
element.short: Helper for

element.name: TWBStartup.sm_Message
element.short: A standard message structure

element.name: tWBStartup.sm_Process
element.short: The process descriptor for you

element.name: tWBStartup.sm_Segment
element.short: a descriptor for your code

element.name: tWBStartup.sm_NumArgs
element.short: the number of elements in ArgList

element.name: tWBStartup.sm_ToolWindow
element.short: Description of window

element.name: tWBStartup.sm_ArgList
element.short: The arguments themselves

element.name: MTYPE_PSTD
element.short: A "standard Potion" message

element.name: MTYPE_TOOLEXIT
element.short: Exit message from our tools

element.name: MTYPE_DISKCHANGE
element.short: Dos telling us of a disk change

element.name: MTYPE_TIMER
element.short: We got a timer tick

element.name: MTYPE_APPWINDOW
element.short: msg from an app window

element.name: MTYPE_APPICON
element.short: msg from an app icon

element.name: MTYPE_APPMENUITEM
element.short: msg from an app menuitem

element.name: MTYPE_COPYEXIT
element.short: exit msg from copy process

element.name: MTYPE_ICONPUT
element.short: msg from PutDiskObject in icon.library

element.name: PAppMessage
element.short: Pointer to an Message from a AppWindow, AppIcon or AppMenuItem

element.name: TAppMessage
element.short: Message from a AppWindow, AppIcon or AppMenuItem

element.name: TAppMessage.am_Message
element.short: Standard message structure

element.name: TAppMessage.am_Type
element.short: Message type (AMTYPE_*)

element.name: TAppMessage.am_UserData
element.short: Application specific

element.name: TAppMessage.am_ID
element.short: Application definable ID

element.name: TAppMessage.am_NumArgs
element.short: Number of elements in arglist

element.name: TAppMessage.am_ArgList
element.short: The arguements themselves

element.name: TAppMessage.am_Version
element.short: Will be

element.name: TAppMessage.am_Class
element.short: Message class (AMCLASSICON_*)

element.name: TAppMessage.am_MouseX
element.short: Mouse x position of event

element.name: TAppMessage.am_MouseY
element.short: Mouse y position of event

element.name: TAppMessage.am_Seconds
element.short: Current system clock time

element.name: TAppMessage.am_Micros
element.short: Current system clock time

element.name: TAppMessage.am_Reserved
element.short: Avoid recompilation

element.name: AM_VERSION
element.short: If you find .am_Version >= AM_VERSION, you know this structure has at least the fields defined in this version of the include file

element.name: AMTYPE_APPWINDOW
element.short: Type for .am_Type, App window message

element.name: AMTYPE_APPICON
element.short: Type for .am_Type, App icon message

element.name: AMTYPE_APPMENUITEM
element.short: Type for .am_Type, App menu item message

element.name: AMCLASSICON_Open
element.short: Class for .am_Class. The "Open" menu item was invoked, the icon got double-clicked or an icon got dropped on it.

element.name: AMCLASSICON_Copy
element.short: Class for .am_Class. The "Copy" menu item was invoked

element.name: AMCLASSICON_Rename
element.short: Class for .am_Class. The "Rename" menu item was invoked

element.name: AMCLASSICON_Information
element.short: Class for .am_Class. The "Information" menu item was invoked

element.name: AMCLASSICON_Snapshot
element.short: Class for .am_Class. The "Snapshot" menu item was invoked

element.name: AMCLASSICON_UnSnapshot
element.short: Class for .am_Class. The "UnSnapshot" menu item was invoked

element.name: AMCLASSICON_LeaveOut
element.short: Class for .am_Class. The "Leave Out" menu item was invoked

element.name: AMCLASSICON_PutAway
element.short: Class for .am_Class. The "Put Away" menu item was invoked

element.name: AMCLASSICON_Delete
element.short: Class for .am_Class. The "Delete" menu item was invoked

element.name: AMCLASSICON_FormatDisk
element.short: Class for .am_Class. The "Format Disk" menu item was invoked

element.name: AMCLASSICON_EmptyTrash
element.short: Class for .am_Class. The "Empty Trash" menu item was invoked

element.name: AMCLASSICON_Selected
element.short: Class for .am_Class. The icon is now selected

element.name: AMCLASSICON_Unselected
element.short: Class for .am_Class. The icon is now unselected

element.name: PAppIconRenderMsg
element.short: The message your AppIcon rendering hook gets invoked with.

element.name: TAppIconRenderMsg
element.short: The message your AppIcon rendering hook gets invoked with.

element.name: TAppIconRenderMsg.arm_RastPort
element.short: RastPort to render into

element.name: TAppIconRenderMsg.arm_Icon
element.short: The icon to be rendered

element.name: TAppIconRenderMsg.arm_Label
element.short: The icon label txt

element.name: TAppIconRenderMsg.arm_Tags
element.short: urther tags to be passed on to DrawIconStateA().

element.name: TAppIconRenderMsg.arm_Left
element.short: Rendering origin, not taking the

element.name: TAppIconRenderMsg.arm_Top
element.short: button border into account.

element.name: TAppIconRenderMsg.arm_Width
element.short: Limit your rendering to

element.name: TAppIconRenderMsg.arm_Height
element.short: this area.

element.name: TAppIconRenderMsg.arm_State
element.short: State of Icon (IDS_*)

element.name: PAppWindowDropZoneMsg
element.short: The message your drop zone hook gets invoked with.

element.name: TAppWindowDropZoneMsg
element.short: The message your drop zone hook gets invoked with.

element.name: TAppWindowDropZoneMsg.adzm_RastPort
element.short: RastPort to render into.

element.name: TAppWindowDropZoneMsg.adzm_DropZoneBox
element.short: Limit your rendering to this area.

element.name: TAppWindowDropZoneMsg.adzm_ID
element.short: This is the ID straight from AddAppWindowDropZoneA().

element.name: TAppWindowDropZoneMsg.adzm_UserData
element.short: This is the UserData straight from AddAppWindowDropZoneA().

element.name: TAppWindowDropZoneMsg.adzm_Action
element.short: Action was done. ,

element.name: ADZMACTION_Enter
element.short: Action for adzm_Action, Something entered the AppItem

element.name: ADZMACTION_Leave
element.short: Action for adzm_Action, Something left the AppItem

element.name: PIconSelectMsg
element.short: The message your icon selection change hook is invoked with.

element.name: tIconSelectMsg
element.short: The message your icon selection change hook is invoked with.

element.name: tIconSelectMsg.ism_Length
element.short: Size of this data structure (in bytes).

element.name: tIconSelectMsg.ism_Drawer
element.short: Lock on the drawer this object resides in, nil for Workbench backdrop (devices).

element.name: tIconSelectMsg.ism_Name
element.short: Name of the object in question.

element.name: tIconSelectMsg.ism_Type
element.short: One of WBDISK, WBDRAWER, WBTOOL, WBPROJECT, WBGARBAGE, WBDEVICE or WBKICK.

element.name: tIconSelectMsg.ism_Selected
element.short: True if currently selected, False otherwise.

element.name: tIconSelectMsg.ism_Tags
element.short: Pointer to the list of tag items passed to ChangeWorkbenchSelectionA().

element.name: tIconSelectMsg.ism_DrawerWindow
element.short: Pointer to the window attached to this icon, if the icon is a drawer-like object.

element.name: tIconSelectMsg.ism_ParentWindow
element.short: Pointer to the window the icon resides in.

element.name: tIconSelectMsg.ism_Left
element.short: Position and size of the icon; note that the

element.name: tIconSelectMsg.ism_Top
element.short: icon may not entirely reside within the visible

element.name: tIconSelectMsg.ism_Width
element.short: bounds of the parent window.

element.name: ISMACTION_Unselect
element.short: This value your hook code can return when the icon should be unselected.

element.name: ISMACTION_Select
element.short: This value your hook code can return when the should be selected.

element.name: ISMACTION_Ignore
element.short: This value your hook code can return when the icon state should not be changed.

element.name: ISMACTION_Stop
element.short: This value your hook code can return when the icon state should not be changed and invoke the hook again.

element.name: PCopyBeginMsg
element.short: A message your copy hook is invoked with.

element.name: TCopyBeginMsg
element.short: A message your copy hook is invoked with.

element.name: TCopyBeginMsg.cbm_Length
element.short: Size of this data structure in bytes.

element.name: TCopyBeginMsg.cbm_Action
element.short: Will be set to .

element.name: TCopyBeginMsg.cbm_SourceDrawer
element.short: A lock on the source drawer.

element.name: TCopyBeginMsg.cbm_DestinationDrawer
element.short: A lock on the destination drawer.

element.name: PCopyDataMsg
element.short: A message your copy hook is invoked with.

element.name: TCopyDataMsg
element.short: A message your copy hook is invoked with.

element.name: TCopyDataMsg.cdm_Length
element.short: Size of this data structure in bytes.

element.name: TCopyDataMsg.cdm_Action
element.short: Will be set to

element.name: TCopyDataMsg.cdm_SourceLock
element.short: A lock on the parent directory of the source file/drawer.

element.name: TCopyDataMsg.cdm_SourceName
element.short: The name of the source file or drawer.

element.name: TCopyDataMsg.cdm_DestinationLock
element.short: A lock on the parent directory of the destination file/drawer.

element.name: TCopyDataMsg.cdm_DestinationName
element.short: The name of the destination file/drawer. This may or may not match the name of the source file/drawer in case the data is to be copied under a different name. For example, this is the case with the Workbench "Copy" command which creates duplicates of file/drawers by prefixing the duplicate's name with "Copy_XXX_of".

element.name: TCopyDataMsg.cdm_DestinationX
element.short: When the icon corresponding to the

element.name: TCopyDataMsg.cdm_DestinationY
element.short: destination is written to disk, this is the position (put into its PDiskObject^.do_CurrentX/PDiskObject^.do_CurrentY fields) it should be placed at.

element.name: PCopyEndMsg
element.short: A message your copy hook is invoked with.

element.name: TCopyEndMsg
element.short: A message your copy hook is invoked with.

element.name: TCopyEndMsg.cem_Length
element.short: Size of this data structure in bytes.

element.name: TCopyEndMsg.cem_Action
element.short: Will be set to either or

element.name: CPACTION_Begin
element.short: Defines MessageType (cbm_Action) as

element.name: CPACTION_Copy
element.short: Defines MessageType (cdm_Action) as
element.descr: This message arrives for each file or drawer to be copied.

element.name: CPACTION_End
element.short: Defines MessageType (cem_Action) as
element.descr: This message arrives when all files/drawers have been copied.

element.name: PDeleteBeginMsg
element.short: A Message your delete hook is invoked with.

element.name: TDeleteBeginMsg
element.short: A Message your delete hook is invoked with.

element.name: TDeleteBeginMsg.dbm_Length
element.short: Size of this data structure in bytes.

element.name: TDeleteBeginMsg.dbm_Action
element.short: Will be set to either or

element.name: PDeleteDataMsg
element.short: A Message your delete hook is invoked with.

element.name: TDeleteDataMsg
element.short: A Message your delete hook is invoked with.

element.name: TDeleteDataMsg.ddm_Length
element.short: Size of this data structure in bytes.

element.name: TDeleteDataMsg.ddm_Action
element.short: Will be set to either or

element.name: TDeleteDataMsg.ddm_Lock
element.short: A Lock on the parent directory of the object whose contents or which itself should be deleted.

element.name: TDeleteDataMsg.ddm_Name
element.short: The name of the object whose contents or which itself should be deleted.

element.name: PDeleteEndMsg
element.short: A Message your delete hook is invoked with.

element.name: TDeleteEndMsg
element.short: A Message your delete hook is invoked with.

element.name: TDeleteEndMsg.dem_Length
element.short: Size of this data structure in bytes.

element.name: TDeleteEndMsg.dem_Action
element.short: Will be set to

element.name: DLACTION_BeginDiscard
element.short: Defined Messagetype .dbm_Action as

element.name: DLACTION_BeginEmptyTrash
element.short: Defined Messagetype .dbm_Action as
element.descr: This indicates that the following delete operations are intended to empty the trashcan.

element.name: DLACTION_DeleteContents
element.short: Defined Messagetype .ddm_Action as
element.descr: This indicates that the object described by lock and name refers to a drawer; you should empty its contents but do not delete the drawer itself!

element.name: DLACTION_DeleteObject
element.short: Defined Messagetype .ddm_Action as
element.descr: This indicates that the object described by lock and name should be deleted; this could be a file or an empty drawer.

element.name: DLACTION_End
element.short: Defined Messagetype .dem_Action as
element.descr: This indicates that the deletion process is finished.

element.name: PSetupCleanupHookMsg
element.short: The message your setup/cleanup hook gets invoked with.

element.name: TSetupCleanupHookMsg
element.short: The message your setup/cleanup hook gets invoked with.

element.name: TSetupCleanupHookMsg.schm_Length
element.short: LEngth of Message

element.name: TSetupCleanupHookMsg.schm_State
element.short: State of Workbench shutdown (SCHMSTATE_*)

element.name: SCHMSTATE_TryCleanup
element.short: State for .schm_State. Workbench will attempt to shut down now.

element.name: SCHMSTATE_Cleanup
element.short: State for .schm_State. Workbench will really shut down now.

element.name: SCHMSTATE_Setup
element.short: State for .schm_State. Workbench is operational again or could not be shut down.
